4. petapan* - Mafia Goon - Survives and wins the game!

1. Gallatin - Traitor Roleblocker - Lynched Day 3

6. Om of the Nom** drmyshotgun Slaxx** Grimmjow*** - Mafia Goon - Lynched Day 4
5. theamateur** - Serial Killer - Killed Night 5
11. CF Riot - Vanilla Townie - Lynched Day 6
7. ChannelDelibird Natalie* InflatablePie* - Vanilla Townie - Endgamed


Rules
1. First and foremost... obey all the site wide rules too.
2. Be civil to the other players! This is supposed to be fun!
3. Play to win the game; use common sense here, please.
4. Do not quote any private messages from the moderator.
5. Do not talk about this game outside of the game thread.
6. Days will last 2 real weeks, Nights will last 3 real days.
7. Voting requires a majority. Unvoting is not necessary.
8. No lynch can occur by majority rule, or if deadline hits.
9. No bah posts. Don't post at all after you're dead, please.
10. Do not edit or delete any posts if you have that ability.
11. All content posted should be easily readable by everyone.
12. If you don't post for over 72 hours, you will be prodded.
13. After 48 more hours without a post, replacement occurs.
14. If you must be prodded three times, you will be replaced.
15. Pretending to break a rule is the same as breaking it.
16. I reserve the right to modify any rule(s) at any time.

Sample PM
Welcome to Mini 1359, Sir Templeton of Wales! You are a Vanilla Townie.

You have no abilities other than your voice and your vote!

At no time may you privately communicate with any other player.

You win the game when all threats to the town are eliminated.

Please confirm your role via PM.

The game thread is here: https://forum.mafiascum.net/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=22792.
I recommend bookmarking it for your own convenience.
